summary: A collection of helper utilities, lightweight model definitions, dataset and datamodule implementations, and testing support tools used throughout the PyTorch Lightning test suite. It supplies mock data loaders, simple classification/regression and GAN models, deterministic and recurrent networks, dataset wrappers for MNIST and scikit‑learn data, pipeline orchestration for training/evaluation, and decorators for conditional test execution.
business_intent: Enable reliable, fast, and reproducible testing of PyTorch Lightning components by providing ready‑made models, data sources, and workflow utilities that reduce boilerplate and isolate test cases from external dependencies.
